means: 甜心爸爸（在年轻女子身上乱花钱的阔老头）

sentence.Network_en: Lucy had strung a banner across the wall saying "Welcome Home Daddy".
sentence.Network_cn: 露西在墙上挂了一条横幅，上面写着“欢迎爸爸回家”。

sentence.Network_en: Daddy called and asked me to drop by his office.
sentence.Network_cn: 爸爸打来电话让我去他办公室一趟。

sentence.Network_en: They hit it off straight away, Daddy and Walter.
sentence.Network_cn: 爸爸和沃尔特很快就一见如故。

list.abs: 这里有不差钱的单身老男人(Sugar Daddy)，还有想赚钱的女孩(Sugar Baby)。来自新加坡的创始人说，这个平台是希望帮助那些与自己 …
糖爹（sugar daddy）（Sugar Daddy）是指自称帮助年轻女性解决经济困难的“慈善家”。他们多为富豪，为“糖宝”一掷千金。
不是吹牛老爹（puff daddy）（Puff Daddy），答案也出乎意料，Puffy是他家爱狗的名字。这条名为Puffy的腊肠犬的确非常上相。

entry.def: Children often call their father daddy .

example.ex: I wrote a letter to Daddy...

means.word_mean: 1. an informal term for a father; probably derived from baby talk

auth_sentence.content: Your daddy had a specially worrisome week last week.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your daddy had a specially worrisome week last week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your daddy had a specially worrisome week last week.

auth_sentence.content: Or how high Daddy can count without using fingers.

auth_sentence.content: You got a picture of your mama and daddy?
auth_sentence.res_content: You got a picture of your mama and daddy?

sentences.en: Daddy, can I have some money?

means.word_mean: 甜心爸爸(在年轻女子身上乱花钱的阔老头)；老色鬼

sentences.en: When you tell him that he’s a sugar daddy, he gets very angry. He says she isn’t interested in his money, only in him.
sentences.cn: 要是你说他是个“ 甜心干爹”，他就会很生气。他说她对他的钱不感兴趣，只喜欢他本人。
